translations: v．使浸水，使充满水：指物体吸收过多水分，导致其失去原有功能。
· The heavy rain waterlogs the soil.

sentences.sentence: In the end, the paper targeted the concrete situation of the flood and waterlogs disasters in Beijing and pointed out the measures on reduction…
sentences.translation: 最后，针对北京洪涝灾害的具体情况，提出了雨洪减灾和雨洪利用的措施，以达到兴利除害的目的。
